title: nee thanda ishai
sahitya: nI tanda isai koNDu unnai uNarndEnE!Adi antam illA harihara sutanE!  anupallavi  mEdiniyil undan nigar nI tAnE!nAda yOgiyar nADum gurunAtanE!  caraNam  pAvalarum pORRum pAvananE endanpAvil nilai koNDa pUraNanE!kEvalac cintayil nAn vIzhndu viDAmalkAvalanE kaDaikkaN pArttaruL seyda
